statements.insert: insert into t_announce(announce_id, announce_type, announce_title, announce_content, announce_publisher, begin_date, end_date, allow_download, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time) values(#ID#, '1', #Title#, #Content#, #Publisher#, #BeginDate#, #EndDate#, 0, #CreateUserID#, #CreateUserName#, getdate())
statements.update: update t_announce set announce_title = #Title#, announce_content = #Content#, announce_publisher = #Publisher#, begin_date = #BeginDate#, end_date = #EndDate#, modify_user_id = #ModifyUserID#, modify_user_name = #ModifyUserName#, modify_time = getdate() where announce_id = #ID# and allow_download=0
update t_announce set allow_download=1, modify_user_id = #UserID#, modify_user_name = #UserName#, modify_time = getdate() where announce_id = #AnnounceID# and allow_download=0
update t_announce set allow_download=0, modify_user_id = #UserID#, modify_user_name = #UserName#, modify_time = getdate() where announce_id = #AnnounceID# and allow_download=1
statements.delete: delete from t_announce where announce_id=#value# and allow_download=0
statements.select: select a.*, case a.allow_download when 1 then '是' else '否' end as allow_download_desc from t_announce a

select count(a.announce_id) from t_announce a, t_announce_type b where a.announce_type=b.announce_type_code
exists (select 1 from t_unit_level b1, t_unit_level b2, t_announce_unit b3 where b1.unit_id=#UnitID# and b2.path_unit_no like b1.path_unit_no + '%' and b3.unit_id=b2.unit_id and b3.announce_id=a.announce_id)
exists (select 1 from (select distinct unit_id from t_user_role where user_id=#UserID# and role_id=#RoleID#) b0 t_unit_level b1, t_unit_level b2, t_announce_unit b3, where b0.unit_id=b1.unit_id and b2.path_unit_no like b1.path_unit_no + '%' and b3.unit_id=b2.unit_id and b3.announce_id=a.announce_id)
a.announce_title like '%' + #Title# + '%'
a.begin_date <= #BeginDate# and a.end_date >=#BeginDate#
a.begin_date <= #EndDate# and a.end_date >=#EndDate#
a.allow_download = #AllowDownload#

select a.* from ( select rownum_=row_number() over(order by a.announce_no desc), a.*, case a.allow_download when 1 then '是' else '否' end as allow_download_desc from t_announce a, t_announce_type b where a.announce_type=b.announce_type_code
exists (select 1 from t_unit_level b1, t_unit_level b2, t_announce_unit b3 where b1.unit_id=#UnitID# and b2.path_unit_no like b1.path_unit_no + '%' and b3.unit_id=b2.unit_id and b3.announce_id=a.announce_id)
exists (select 1 from (select distinct unit_id from t_user_role where user_id=#UserID# and role_id=#RoleID#) b0 t_unit_level b1, t_unit_level b2, t_announce_unit b3, where b0.unit_id=b1.unit_id and b2.path_unit_no like b1.path_unit_no + '%' and b3.unit_id=b2.unit_id and b3.announce_id=a.announce_id)
a.announce_title like '%' + #Title# + '%'
a.begin_date <= #BeginDate# and a.end_date >=#BeginDate#
a.begin_date <= #EndDate# and a.end_date >=#EndDate#
a.allow_download = #AllowDownload#
) a where rownum_ > #StartRow# and rownum_<=#EndRow#
